verses.name: John 9:22
verses.text: These words spake his parents, because they feared the Jews: for the Jews had agreed already, that if any man did confess that he was Christ, he should be put out of the synagogue.

verses.name: John 9:23
verses.text: Therefore said his parents, He is of age; ask him.

verses.name: John 9:24
verses.text: Then again called they the man that was blind, and said unto him, Give God the praise: we know that this man is a sinner.

verses.name: John 9:25
verses.text: He answered and said, Whether he be a sinner or no, I know not: one thing I know, that, whereas I was blind, now I see.
